name: Internal Host Recon/Compromise - ICS/Management Protocol Scan
description: Detects scanning or connection attempts targeting highly sensitive Industrial Control System (ICS) or out-of-band management protocols (IPMI, MMS, PROFINET_IO, EtherNet/IP, S7COMM, DNP3, IEC60870). Any activity related to these protocols from non-authorized sources is a critical security concern.
